00040 ostream* os_ = 0;

00042 
00043 void initializeSpectrumList(SpectrumListSimple& spectrumList)
00044 {
00045     // initialize with scans:
00046     // scan  0: IT
00047     // scan  5: FT (1,100)
00048     // scan 10: IT (1,100), (2,200)
00049     // scan 15: FT (1,100), (2,200), (3,300)
00050     // scan 20: IT (1,100), (2,200), (3,300), (4,400)
00051     // ...
00052 
00053     for (int i=0; i<=10; i++)
00054     {
00055         SpectrumPtr spectrum(new Spectrum);
00056         spectrum->nativeID = lexical_cast<string>(i*5);
00057         
00058         spectrum->cvParams.push_back(i%2 ? 
00059             MS_FT_ICR :
00060             MS_ion_trap);
00061 
00062         BinaryDataArrayPtr bdMZ(new BinaryDataArray);
00063         bdMZ->cvParams.push_back(MS_m_z_array);
00064         spectrum->binaryDataArrayPtrs.push_back(bdMZ);
00065 
00066         BinaryDataArrayPtr bdIntensity(new BinaryDataArray);
00067         bdIntensity->cvParams.push_back(MS_intensity_array);
00068         spectrum->binaryDataArrayPtrs.push_back(bdIntensity);
00069 
00070         for (int j=1; j<=i; j++)
00071         {
00072             bdMZ->data.push_back(j);
00073             bdIntensity->data.push_back(100*j);
00074         }
00075 
00076         spectrum->defaultArrayLength = i;
00077         spectrumList.spectra.push_back(spectrum);
00078     }
00079 }
00080 
00081 
00082 const char* anal(const CVParam& cvParam)
00083 {
00084     if (cvParam == MS_FT_ICR)
00085         return "FT";
00086     else if (cvParam == MS_ion_trap)
00087         return "IT";
00088     else 
00089         return "Unknown";
00090 }
00091 
00092 
00093 void printSpectrumList(ostream& os, const SpectrumList& sl)
00094 {
00095     if (os_) *os_ << "printSpectrumList()\n";
00096 
00097     for (unsigned int i=0; i<sl.size(); i++)
00098     {
00099         SpectrumPtr spectrum = sl.spectrum(i);
00100         os << spectrum->nativeID << " "
00101            << anal(spectrum->cvParamChild(MS_mass_analyzer)) << endl;
00102 
00103         vector<MZIntensityPair> mziPairs;
00104         spectrum->getMZIntensityPairs(mziPairs);
00105         copy(mziPairs.begin(), mziPairs.end(), ostream_iterator<MZIntensityPair>(os,""));
00106         os << endl;
00107     }
00108 }

00110 
00111 void testBasic(const SpectrumList& sl)
00112 {
00113     if (os_) *os_ << "testBasic()\n";
00114 
00115     SpectrumIterator it(sl);
00116 
00117     unit_assert(it->nativeID == "0");
00118     unit_assert((*it).cvParamChild(MS_mass_analyzer_type) == MS_ion_trap);
00119     unit_assert(it->binaryDataArrayPtrs.size() == 2);
00120 
00121     ++it; ++it; ++it; ++it; ++it; // advance to scan 5
00122 
00123     unit_assert(it->nativeID == "25");
00124     unit_assert(it->cvParamChild(MS_mass_analyzer_type) == MS_FT_ICR);
00125     unit_assert(it->binaryDataArrayPtrs.size() == 2 &&
00126                 it->binaryDataArrayPtrs[0]->data.size() == 5);
00127 }
00128 
00129 
00130 void doSomething(const Spectrum& spectrum)
00131 {
00132     if (os_) *os_ << "spectrum: " << spectrum.nativeID << " "
00133                   << anal(spectrum.cvParamChild(MS_mass_analyzer)) << endl; 
00134     
00135     vector<MZIntensityPair> pairs;
00136     spectrum.getMZIntensityPairs(pairs);
00137 
00138     if (os_)
00139     {
00140         copy(pairs.begin(), pairs.end(), ostream_iterator<MZIntensityPair>(*os_,"")); 
00141         *os_ << endl;
00142     }
00143   
00144     unit_assert((int)pairs.size()*5 == lexical_cast<int>(spectrum.nativeID));
00145 }
00146 
00147 
00148 void testForEach(const SpectrumList& spectrumList)
00149 {
00150     if (os_) *os_ << "testForEach(): \n";
00151     for_each(SpectrumIterator(spectrumList), SpectrumIterator(), doSomething);
00152 }
00153 
00154 
00155 void testIntegerSet(const SpectrumList& spectrumList)
00156 {
00157     // iterate through even scan numbers 
00158 
00159     if (os_) *os_ << "testIntegerSet():\n";
00160 
00161     IntegerSet scanNumbers;
00162     for (int i=2; i<=50; i+=2) // note that some scan numbers don't exist in spectrumList 
00163         scanNumbers.insert(i);
00164     
00165     // loop written for illustration
00166     // note automatic conversion from IntegerSet to SpectrumIterator::Config
00167     for (SpectrumIterator it(spectrumList, scanNumbers); it!=SpectrumIterator(); ++it)
00168         doSomething(*it); 
00169 
00170     // using for_each: 
00171     for_each(SpectrumIterator(spectrumList, scanNumbers), SpectrumIterator(), doSomething);
00172 }
00173 
00174 
00175 inline int getScanNumber(const Spectrum& spectrum) 
00176 {
00177     return lexical_cast<int>(spectrum.nativeID);
00178 }
00179 
00180 
00181 class FTSieve : public SpectrumIterator::Sieve
00182 {
00183     public:
00184     virtual bool accept(const Spectrum& spectrum) const 
00185     {
00186         return (spectrum.cvParamChild(MS_mass_analyzer_type) == MS_FT_ICR);
00187     }
00188 };
00189 
00190 
00191 void testSieve(const SpectrumList& spectrumList)
00192 {
00193     vector<int> ftScanNumbers;
00194 
00195     FTSieve sieve;
00196     SpectrumIterator::Config config(sieve, false);
00197 
00198     transform(SpectrumIterator(spectrumList, config),
00199               SpectrumIterator(), 
00200               back_inserter(ftScanNumbers), 
00201               getScanNumber);
00202 
00203     if (os_)
00204     {
00205         *os_ << "testSieve():\n"; 
00206         copy(ftScanNumbers.begin(), ftScanNumbers.end(), ostream_iterator<int>(*os_, " "));
00207         *os_ << endl;
00208     }
00209 
00210     unit_assert(ftScanNumbers.size() == 5);
00211     unit_assert(ftScanNumbers[0] == 5);
00212     unit_assert(ftScanNumbers[1] == 15);
00213     unit_assert(ftScanNumbers[2] == 25);
00214     unit_assert(ftScanNumbers[3] == 35);
00215     unit_assert(ftScanNumbers[4] == 45);
00216 }
00217 
00218 
00219 void testIteratorEquality(const SpectrumList& spectrumList)
00220 {
00221     if (os_) *os_ << "testIteratorEquality()\n";
00222 
00223     SpectrumIterator it(spectrumList);
00224     ++it; ++it; ++it;
00225 
00226     SpectrumIterator jt(spectrumList);
00227     unit_assert(it!=jt);
00228     ++jt;
00229     unit_assert(it!=jt);
00230     ++jt;
00231     unit_assert(it!=jt);
00232     ++jt;
00233     unit_assert(it==jt);
00234 }
00235 
00236 
00237 void testMSDataConstruction()
00238 {
00239     if (os_) *os_ << "testMSDataConstruction()\n";
00240 
00241     SpectrumListSimplePtr sl(new SpectrumListSimple());
00242     initializeSpectrumList(*sl);
00243 
00244     MSData msd;
00245     msd.run.spectrumListPtr = sl; 
00246 
00247     int i = 0;
00248     FTSieve sieve;
00249     for (SpectrumIterator it(msd, sieve); it!=SpectrumIterator(); ++it, ++i)
00250     {
00251         if (os_) *os_ << it->nativeID << " "
00252                       << anal(it->cvParamChild(MS_mass_analyzer)) << endl;
00253 
00254         unit_assert(it->nativeID == lexical_cast<string>(5+i*10));
00255     }
00256 }
00257 
00258 
00259 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00260 {
00261     try
00262     {
00263         if (argc>1 && !strcmp(argv[1],"-v")) os_ = &cout;
00264 
00265         SpectrumListSimple spectrumList;
00266         initializeSpectrumList(spectrumList);
00267         if (os_) printSpectrumList(*os_, spectrumList);
00268 
00269         testBasic(spectrumList);
00270         testForEach(spectrumList);
00271         testIntegerSet(spectrumList);
00272         testSieve(spectrumList);
00273         testIteratorEquality(spectrumList);
00274         testMSDataConstruction();
00275 
00276         return 0;
00277     }
00278     catch (exception& e)
00279     {
00280         cerr << e.what() << endl;
00281         return 1;
00282     }
00283 }
